Password: Password： *At least 6 characters, recommended to mix uppercase and lowercase alphabets, numbers and symbols Note: Be sure to keep your wallet password in mind, the server will not store your password, you will not be able to retrieve the password if forgetting or losing! Password don\'t match Password can\'t be empty 6 characters at least Confirm password can\'t be empty Create Create Wallet Set password
Confirm password Strength Weak Ordinary Good Strong Keystore Keystore content Mnemonic phrase Private Key Copy and paste ATON official wallet\'s Keystore to the input field, or scan the QR Code generated with Keystore\'s information to import. Start to import Wallet password Name of wallet Name of address Address of Wallet Input the Mnemonic phrase. Please pay attention to case sensitivity and sequence. Please separate each Mnemonic Phrase with a space Input the Private Key, or scan the QR Code generated with Private Key to import. Please pay attention to case sensitivity. Enter Private Key Backup Wallet Backup Mnemonic Success One last step，Back it up Mnemonic phrase consist of 12 common English words converted from 64-bit private key by algorithm. Please write down the words on paper and keep them in a safe place. Start to backup Input wallet password Enter wallet password to confirm deletion Cancel Confirm Yes No Do not screenshot Please keep your mnemonic phrase safe to prevent theft of your assets. Please keep your Private Key safe to prevent theft of assets. Please keep your Keystore safe to prevent theft of assets. Understood OK Please write down the words on the paper Those 12 mnemonic words are for recovering your wallet, write down correctly on paper and keep in a safe place. Next Classic Wallet Joint Wallet Backup Wallet Please choose mnemonics words in order. Submit Submit Empty No Wallet yet. There is no any Joint Wallet yet There is no any Classic Wallet yet Transactions Transactions Send NEXT Send Receive Vote Voting Wallet Address Send Amount Amount Amount Amount From Change Select Fee Cheaper Faster Send Transaction Vote Transaction Wallet name Wallet Name： Public Key Share to friends From To %1$s Energon Select Wallet Select Address Create Joint Wallet Select Owner Joint Owners Required Signatures Wallet Management Address Book Settings Help About About Us Service Agreement Official Community Add Joint Wallet Add Create Import Wallet Vote Me Disclaimer Please be sure to keep the mnemonic phrase in a safe place. ATON is not responsible for any loss of assets caused by forgetting, losing or theft. Backup Failed Please check the words\' order. Delegate Total Delegated %1$s LAT Record My Delegations Validators FAQ Tutorial View all validators, Delegate Delegation Record All No record Delegate node details Locked delegate Only locked delegates are rewarded.Un-delegation (i.e. withdrawal) takes immediate effect.but,the delegated LAT takes 6.1 hours to unlock and return to the account. Unlocked delegate Locked in about 6.1 hours, the unlocked delegate has no reward.Un-delegation (i.e. withdrawal) takes immediate effect.and,the delegated LAT immediately returns to the account. Released delegate Validator exits, the delegations is automatically released,and need user to withdraw the delegations RANK All Active Verifying Candidate Locked Validator Details Total Staked(LAT) Delegations(LAT) Delegators Slash Blocks Block rate Introduction Website Withdraw Delegate Yield Yield The expected annualized rate of the current validator, the Delegation rewards is distributed by the validator Input Amount (not less than %1$s LAT) Note The delegations will be locked for at least one epoch(10750 blocks) to gain. According to the delegated reward ratio set by the nodes, the profits obtained by the nodes are distributed. Node benefits include block rewards and staking rewards. Delegations The user can withdraw the delegated token at any time.The Validator\'s operator address are not allowed for delegation. The transaction has been successfully submitted and the delegated LAT can return to your account immediately.\nThe Invalid delegations has to be withdrawal all at once;\nIf the remaining delegations has been less than %1$sLAT, it will be automatically returned all. Rewards The delegations will be locked for at least one epoch(10750 blocks) to gain. According to the delegated reward ratio set by the nodes, the profits obtained by the nodes are distributed. Node benefits include block rewards and staking rewards. Risk No risk. Locked delegate Unlocked delegate Released delegate Undelegating Move out Withdraw Yield Staked

Observed • Recommend observed wallet and cold wallet to jointly manage large amount of tokens.\n• Need the cold wallet authorization for transferring tokens.\n• Observed wallet do not hold the private key.\n• Do not deposit tokens to the wallet that you can not control.
